text: Ba jod or ej Rasul, qissai zani Imron va duxtaras Marjam va Iso alajhissalomro; to in ki tu rad namoi kasonero, ki da'vo kardaand, ki Iso Alloh ast jo farzandi Alloh ast. Cun guft zani Imron: Ej Parvardigori man, on ci ki dar sikam doram, ʙaroi Tu nazr kardam, In nazrro az man ʙipazir, ki Tu tanho sunavoi ʙa du'oi man va donoi ʙa nijati man
